column4: a VPN server,client just can access local resoures.What' s the promblem?
My VPN server,the client just can access to the local resoures.
What's the promblem?
i try everything and didn't work.
can you use more sentences to describe what's wrong?
because i have no idea what you're asking
Thank for your attention. I mean
I make a VPN server.But when client connect to it,the client just can access to the local resoures
Can't access to the Internet.
sounds like the route being sent by your vpn's dhcp isn't configured for split tunneling
your route is definitely the problem. is it that you can only reach your local LAN, only your VPN's network, both of those two but not the net...or what?
Just the VPN's network.
ok, so you need split tunneling. youre going to have to figure out what IP range should be going through the VPN and what should not
Sorry,my English is poor.I trying my best to describle my problem.
split tunneling means you have certain data go to the VPN and certain data go elsewhere
htats not the problem
its the output of "route -n" that needs to change
are you using network manager vpn plugins or the command line?
command line
awww now you're going to make me have to remember commands i haven't used in years :P
can we take this to PM?
this channel is too busy
Certainly
